snippet: A man on crutches was crossing First Avenue at 89th Street when he lost his balance and was hit by a truck during the morning rush hour.
abstract: A man on crutches was crossing First Avenue at 89th Street when he lost his balance and was hit by a truck during the morning rush hour.

byline.original: By ANDY NEWMAN and RANDY LEONARD

headline.main: 75-Year-Old Pedestrian Fatally Struck on First Avenue
